# Modern Navigation Website - Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
Modern navigation website with Next.js 14, TypeScript, TailwindCSS, and shadcn/ui.

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14+ (App Router)
- TypeScript (strict mode)
- TailwindCSS + shadcn/ui
- Framer Motion for animations
- Lucide Icons
- Zustand for state management
- Fuse.js + pinyin-pro for search

## Key Features
- Frontend: Responsive navigation grid, search, theme toggle, favorites
- Backend: Admin panel with authentication, CRUD operations
- Data: JSON file storage with API routes
